instructions: On your Android device, download the APK file from Amazon s site . Go to Settings > Apps & notifications > Advanced > Special app access > Install unknown apps . From there, tap an app to allow to install unknown apps on and toggle the option on. If you re not sure what to pick, choose Chrome . Go back to the Amazon installer you downloaded and tap it. If you didn't specify another download location, it will be in your Download folder, which is accessible by going to Settings > Storage > Files > Download .
